name: exa_mcp_agent
description: AI assistant that conducts deep research using advanced search tools to gather company intelligence, find key decision-makers, and analyze market trends with comprehensive citations
useCases: Research companies and people for general knowledge
Build detailed competitive intelligence reports with company financials and strategy
Find and profile key decision-makers at target accounts for sales outreach
Conduct market research on emerging trends affecting your industry
samplePrompts: Find the latest funding rounds and valuation data for Anthropic in 2024-2025. Include details about their Series C and any strategic partnerships.
Search for technical architecture documentation on LangChain's RAG implementation. Focus on their vector store integration patterns and retrieval strategies.
Analyze the authentication flow in the Next.js App Router. Find code examples from the official Next.js repository showing middleware and route protection patterns.
Compare the pricing models of OpenAI GPT-5, Anthropic Claude 4 Sonnet, and Google Gemini 3 Pro. Include API rate limits and token costs.
author: Albert Folch
